attributes.action: ensure all schools provide lockers for children of all ages and encourage their use.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children should not have to carry heavy bags to and from school.  Poor posture and back pain can begin in young children and cause problems for life.  Long-term back pain accounts for significant levels of distress, disability and unemployment in the UK.  We all need to learn the value of carrying only what we need from an early age.
